name: PhoneThat
description:
Phone That was made for EC jam 4 with the theme 'connect'

IMPORTANT: to play, you or one of your friends need to download the attached 'repository.txt'. It contains the list of all the phone numbers that will help you complete the game.

Controls:

  • WASD or arrows for movement, +space for jump
  • Compose phone numbers with numpad or mouse

Ressources:

  • Press Start font by Codeman38
  • OpenMpt for music
  • sfxr to generate sounds by DrPetter
  • made with GameMaker

Have fun!
